ðŸ“– Summary: Zee is a modern, terminal-based text editor written in Rust, inspired by Emacs. It emphasizes performance and leverages technologies like rope data structures and Tree-sitter for efficient text manipulation and syntax highlighting. Zee aims to provide a fast and feature-rich editing experience within the terminal.
